name: Adjustable Dumbbells Set
description: Space-saving adjustable dumbbells from 5-52.5 lbs each. Quick-change weight selection for efficient workouts.

name: Running Shoes Pro
description: High-performance running shoes with responsive cushioning, breathable mesh upper, and carbon fiber plate for energy return.

name: Vitamin C Serum
description: 20% Vitamin C serum with Hyaluronic Acid and Vitamin E. Brightens skin, reduces dark spots, and boosts collagen production.

name: Luxury Perfume Set
description: Collection of 5 premium fragrances in travel-size bottles. Includes woody, floral, and fresh scents for any occasion.

name: Electric Toothbrush
description: Sonic electric toothbrush with 5 cleaning modes, 2-minute timer, and 30-day battery life. Includes 4 brush heads.

name: Hair Dryer Professional
description: Ionic hair dryer with 1875W motor, multiple heat and speed settings, and concentrator nozzle. Reduces frizz and drying time.
